Who: RODIMUS, Perceptor, Darkhawk
Location: Black Fortress - Cell Block Control Room

> Looking to Rodimus said "Is something related to her, right?"Perceptor
> thought a little bit and said "She's in her quaters now, if you want to pay
> a visit; I can stay a while... But let me tell you an advice for your good
> sake: Dont do something stupid, Rodimus; for her, dont do it; I'm quite
> fond of you two... By the pit, I'm getting old" lamented the Predacon but he
> added"but if you do something stupid due her, hydras could start to restrict
> her movements... Whatever happens dont start to give problems to others"

For a moment fear and some other emotion, perhaps anger swept across
Rodimus' face as Perceptor spoke of restricting Nightlight. He was not
even sure why the emotion came over him so strongly. However it passed
almost as quickly as it came. Rodimus looked back at the security
console where he had been talking to Tuscon a few moments ago.

"What do you make of that Autobot Tuscon?" Rodimus said, his tone both
annoyed and yet curious at the same time. "Twice he came in here
trying to rescue people, and has been captured both times, yet he
keeps on trying. He hasn't given up."

 Deep in his mind, far down where no one could see, he began to wonder
about Tuscon and his words, it was like some small flame was trying to
light, but kept sputtering out.

However outwardly Rodimus just shook his head, "It just doesn't make
any sense to me." he said, his voice cool and low, not sure what he
believed any more.

(TAG)

Preston
